statements: SELECT * FROM users;

SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;

SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, roles FROM access_control ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, roles FROM users JOIN access_control ON users.user_id = access_control.user_id WHERE access_control.roles @> '["admin"]';

SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, user_id FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;

SELECT username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE password_hash = '12345';
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT username, role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE role_name = 'admin';

SELECT role_name, permission_name FROM user_roles JOIN role_permission_mappings ON user_roles.role_id = role_permission_mappings.role_id JOIN user_permissions ON role_permission_mappings.permission_id = user_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id WHERE user_roles.role_id = 1;

SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_role_mappings ON users.user_id = user_role_mappings.user_id WHERE user_role_mappings.role_id = 2

SELECT users.username, user_roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_role_mappings ON users.user_id = user_role_mappings.user_id JOIN user_roles ON user_role_mappings.role_id = user_roles.role_id ORDER BY users.created_at DESC
